abstract: The asset manager Janus Capital Group said Monday that its chief financial officer, Dave R. Martin, and general counsel, John H. Bluher, were leaving the firm in unrelated departures. Three months ago, the chief executive, Gary D. Black, stepped down as chief investment officer in favor of two co-chief investment officers to focus on growing the business.
lead_paragraph: The asset manager Janus Capital Group said Monday that its chief financial officer, Dave R. Martin, and general counsel, John H. Bluher, were leaving the firm in unrelated departures. Three months ago, the chief executive, Gary D. Black, stepped down as chief investment officer in favor of two co-chief investment officers to focus on growing the business.

headline.main: Two Executives to Leave Janus Capital
